Renin Cells under Basal Conditions

Recruited Renin Cells from Ren1c-YFP reporter mice; the animals were subjected to low salt diet and captopril in their drinking water (0.5g/L) for one week prior to harvest which triggers transformation of vascular cells into renin expressing cells.
